rev.desc.rev.desc: remove panel check.keyed
add variable $L.timeout.needed to enable/disable query timeout
update panel start, call.process, set.new.view, setup.new.table, add variable $L.view.id
update panel check.viewsearch, parse.inbox, reset.contents, set.inboxquery, change $L.inbox.view.file to $L.inbox.view
update panel append.query, support join table query
>>>With Process:
delete the lines
Panel: call.process
$L.advFind.var.names add var "$L.inbox.view" into names Panel: after.process
if (not (null($L.inbox.view))) then ($L.view=$L.inbox.view)
>>> Without Process
set.inboxquery
add line $L.view=$L.inbox.view.file
SQL cross-table query defect in Expert Search
The dropdown lists of "View" are not translated when opening "Search Changes"page
update start panel and duplicate.for.thread, support $G.de.view.thread
View variable is not cleared when selecting new view in configuration mgt module
The previously selected view name is not cleared up for a new search
when use view search, pass the sort and group when select, then didn't call setsort again
Modified append.query and select.records panel
append.query: call generate.sql.query() to regen current sql
select.records: parse in the regened sql to select
Call RTE function $L.void=display.value.copy($L.file.copy, $L.file) when backup or reset file content
Roll back the modifications of logical name solution, the logic is handled in RTE instead

Replace select panel by fselect function to get search colunms before doing select, this is for logical name solution purpose. RTE will decide if needs do cross-table query based on the search columns
to handle predefined fields related issues
merge 9.32
to support jscall function to retrieve the format name.
panel/init.vars
add $L.tableAccess.expert, $L.tableAccess.admin to the list, so that display can use this two PD security.
Add variable $L.view.name in start panel
QCCR1E64842: remove the last line in decide.ess.many.
If only one record exist, system will show the record directly, not show the list any more.
Feature name: Configuration Data Externalization
add a panel: advFind.view.local
localize inbox names for each table.
Story: 26536 - Enhanced Application Framework (EAF)
45871 - merge EAF code to Henry branch
Task: 46242 - DEV: load in eafDocEngine unload
Panel: call.base.add
Changed the following expression from:
$L.base.vars={$L.object.name, $L.save.mode, $L.orig.format, $L.category, $L.phase, $L.parent}
To:
$L.base.vars={$L.object.name, $L.save.mode, $L.orig.format, $L.parent}
Story: 26536 - Enhanced Application Framework (EAF)
45871 - merge EAF code to Henry branch
Task: 46242 - DEV: load in eafDocEngine unload
Panel: call.base.add
Added the following expression:
$L.base.var.names={"$L.object.name", "$L.save.mode", "$L.orig.format", "$L.parent"}
Panel: call.base.add.1
Changed the value:
$L.base.vars
To:
$L.base.var.names
Adding the value:
$L.base.vars
Panel: display.decide.1
Add the exit:
setup.new
Condition:
$L.action="new"
Panel: setup.tableAccess
Added the following expression:
if (filename($L.env)="tableAccess") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, $L.env, $L.object, $L.folder.exists))
Added the following panels:
call.engine.new
setup.new

QC54122 - The RAD applications se.search.engine and se.view.engine do not consider that the PM module can have different access configuration for problems, problem tasks, known errors and known error tasks.
Panel: setup.tableAccess
From:
if (exists("tableAccess", $L.env) and not null(tableAccess in $L.env)) then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccess in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))
To:

if (exists("tableAccess", $L.env) and not null(tableAccess in $L.env) and filename($L.file)~="rootcause" and filename($L.file)~="rootcausetask" and filename($L.file)~="knownerror" and filename($L.file)~="knownerrortask") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccess in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessProb", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessProb in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="rootcause") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessProb in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessTask", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessTask in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="rootcausetask") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessTask in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessKE", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessKE in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="knownerror") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessKE in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessKETask", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessKETask in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="knownerrortask") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessKETask in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))
Removed the following expression from the 'reset.contents' panel:
cleanup($L.view)
QC8467 - Attempting to use "expand array" on a Affected Ci's in Change Management - Could possibly be renamed to "Data Corruption Wizard".
Removed the panel "edit.array" of type "edit.array"
Removed the exists to the panel "edit.array" from the following panels:
- display.decide.1
Cannot drill into a single record from an inbox/view or chart listing joinfile records
add new panel: decide.inbox, parse.inbox, set.inboxquery
update decide.advanced / set.advFilter, set exit to "decide.inbox"
RAD se.search.engine
Panel setup.new.table
Added expression:
cleanup($L.authorized)
Panel check.list.engine, check.list.engine.1
Added process panel with following expression:
$L.smart.search.save=$smart.search
Panel reset.contents
Added the following expression:
$smart.search=$L.smart.search.save
Panel no.records
Added expression:
contents($L.file)=contents($L.file.copy)
Panels clear, restore
Added code to support restoring Advanced Find features: More choices, Ranges, Advanced Filter
Also removed probsummary specific code and replaced it with generic support for restoring Smart Search and IR Spreading values
Clear panel
$L.init.run=false (so the init process will run again)
Rally DE2515
updated the 'clear' panel. Added the following expression to set $L.object.name to the current filename:
$L.object.name=filename($L.file)
also changed the normal exit from 'start' to 'decide.build.search.table.list'
Rally DE2119
panel: get.link
Changed the parameter 'Format Name' from $L.format to nullsub(searchFormat in $L.config, $L.format)
This is in order to use the search link instead of the master link when appropriaet to avoid populating fields not contained in the search screen.
RALLY DE2145
panel: set.screen.id
added the following expression:
if ($L.format="FilterAdvFind") then ($L.format=file.name in $L.object)
This way the correct format control is used when hitting back after a search.
Default for external query is now a pop up box.
Do not process query if there is an invalid advanced query (unattached compounds).
Wasn't resetting environment variable when switching files using Advanced Find.
added 'removeSelection' to the modifyFilter exit on the display.decide.1 panel
Recompiled to fix broken parameters.
Pass the new advanced search variables to a process correctly when passing in a query.
Added in a global search view variable to pass to list and search engines.
Added advanced search functions
Added passthru for views coming from advanced find.
Added new panels (decide.ess.many and check.ess) to check for ESS and no records state before calling list engine.
Set up list of allowed folders.
Bring up views when opening inboxes.
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
On the clear and restore panels, added processing to make sure that $smart.search variable is correctly set when doing a clear/restore.
Devtx: I3035
I modified the se.search.engine application, mark.external.query panel to check if the passed in query was a variable. If it was then it does an evaluate & parse on the query.
$L.a.char1=substr($L.external.query, 1, 1)
if ($L.a.char1="$") then ($L.external.query=evaluate(parse($L.external.query, 2)))
Made changes for I2566
I make $L.sql=NULL if the action is "search" on the display.decide panel.
Devtx I1464
Updated se.search.engine app on check.env panel to use exit to init.vars if:
nullsub($L.authorized, false) or $L.admin.mode=true and index("SysAdmin", $lo.ucapex)>0
devtx I1447
updated the get.link panel to pass in $L.object.type to the 'se.get.link.application'
Modified the set.mult.yes and set.mult.no panels to remove the $L.sort={} expression.
Honor stored QBE formats passed in
Updated the no authorized message to use the table name if it is available.
Added the following line:
if (not null(file.name in $L.object)) then ($L.no.auth.msg=scmsg(185, "object", {file.name in $L.object}))
Added the $L.exit.when.done variable to the process call and post check.
Changed for Cut through.
Changed the condition for the mark.external.query exit on the check.query panel:
From:
not null($L.external.query)
To:
not null($L.external.query) or $L.from.query=true
Updated for cut through changes. Now will pass an external query to the search processes if a non standard search "Process" is defined.
Panel fill
Changed the normal exit from display to check.fc.display.
Fixed parameter issue for previous change.
Updated to pop the "No records found" message.
Added processing to "clear" and "restore" panels to support the restore of global variable information on the search screen for probsummary.
Changed the way the object name (for display) is generated.
Added friendlier error message when the table cannot be displayed.
Do not default format to object name, that happens correctly in se.get.object now.
Add processing now goes through se.base.method.
Modified application to exit if engine.access in $L.object is false - the file is not accessible through the engine.
Modified cleanup to clean up $smart.search.
master format control was not being called when adding a new record from a database search screen.
Added 3 panels and changed the flow to:
display.decide.1 --> get.master.fc --> check.master.fc --> check.mater.fc.add --> add.fc
Removed extraneous panels.
added a line to the set.screen.id panel .
Inserted the following into the 4th line:
if ($L.object.type="device") then ($L.format=$L.default.format)
now the format will remain the same when using the 'Search Specific Type' option in Inventory Management even after doing a search and then hitting the back button.
Now passes back the qbe format parameter from expert search.
Added a parameter for QBE format. Specifically for use by query.stored.
Added the se.get.link routine to allow for master (File) links.
Added $L.format to the list of variables available to the init process.
Modification for special object type "device"
Change was made on the thread.list.engine panel:
changed the normal exit from 'reset.contents' to 'check.exit.list'
fixed a parenthesis in check.list.engine.
When coming from an external query that has no records but the external option is set to "stay", the $L.from.query variable is reset when the search screen is displayed.
Modified so that $L.sort is always an array.
Will now run the display format control.
Modified post.add panel to go directly to select.records rather than search.
Added internationalization messages.
on panel no.records i removeed the code the null'd the sql line
Added in threading for Search -> List.
Cursor position is now kept when doing a validity lookup.
Added initial format control call.
Perform a get.base.form.name on the format name to ensure we get the right formatcontrol and link records.
Added $L.messages to the parameters passed to processes.
Added option for finding revisions.
Added exits of "runquery" and "display"
If using an $L.exit of "new" from a process, you will now go to the view engine with a mode of "add"

Changed post.add exit from select.records to search to pass the new record (instead of a null query) into se.list.engine. Nulled out sysmodtime, sysmoduser and sysmodcount fields on a failed add before returning to the display screen.
Added $L.mode="search"
Added no auth message.
Added in default sort (from format control or environment).
When you add a record, it will show up in a record list immediately instead of showing a blank record list.
Due to database using the search engine, the change is now made here instead of the database application. Changed the normal exit for the panel find from display to call a new panel call.db.init
Added the functionality to run a script specified in the formatcontrol upon entry.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.

descript.descript: remove panel check.keyed

update panel start, call.process, set.new.view, setup.new.table, add variable $L.view.id

update panel append.query, support join table query

>>> Without Process
set.inboxquery
add line $L.view=$L.inbox.view.file

QC54122 - The RAD applications se.search.engine and se.view.engine do not consider that the PM module can have different access configuration for problems, problem tasks, known errors and known error tasks.
Panel: setup.tableAccess
From:
if (exists("tableAccess", $L.env) and not null(tableAccess in $L.env)) then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccess in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))
To:

if (exists("tableAccess", $L.env) and not null(tableAccess in $L.env) and filename($L.file)~="rootcause" and filename($L.file)~="rootcausetask" and filename($L.file)~="knownerror" and filename($L.file)~="knownerrortask") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccess in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessProb", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessProb in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="rootcause") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessProb in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessTask", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessTask in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="rootcausetask") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessTask in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessKE", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessKE in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="knownerror") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessKE in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

if (exists("tableAccessKETask", $L.env) and not null(tableAccessKETask in $L.env) and filename($L.file)="knownerrortask") then ($L.void=jscall("tableAccess.setAccessVars", $L.file, tableAccessKETask in $L.env, $L.object, exists("folder", $L.file)))

Added expression:

Added expression:

Panels clear, restore
Added code to support restoring Advanced Find features: More choices, Ranges, Advanced Filter
Also removed probsummary specific code and replaced it with generic support for restoring Smart Search and IR Spreading values
Rally DE2515
updated the 'clear' panel. Added the following expression to set $L.object.name to the current filename:

also changed the normal exit from 'start' to 'decide.build.search.table.list'
Rally DE2119
panel: get.link
Changed the parameter 'Format Name' from $L.format to nullsub(searchFormat in $L.config, $L.format)
This is in order to use the search link instead of the master link when appropriaet to avoid populating fields not contained in the search screen.
RALLY DE2145
panel: set.screen.id
added the following expression:
if ($L.format="FilterAdvFind") then ($L.format=file.name in $L.object)
This way the correct format control is used when hitting back after a search.
Default for external query is now a pop up box.
Do not process query if there is an invalid advanced query (unattached compounds).
Wasn't resetting environment variable when switching files using Advanced Find.
added 'removeSelection' to the modifyFilter exit on the display.decide.1 panel
Recompiled to fix broken parameters.
Pass the new advanced search variables to a process correctly when passing in a query.
Added in a global search view variable to pass to list and search engines.
Added advanced search functions
Added passthru for views coming from advanced find.
Added new panel, decide.ess.many, to set $L.exit="many" if ESS mode and no records were returned.
Set up list of allowed folders.
Bring up views when opening inboxes.
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
On the clear and restore panels, added processing to make sure that $smart.search variable is correctly set when doing a clear/restore.
Devtx: I3035
I modified the se.search.engine application, mark.external.query panel to check if the passed in query was a variable. If it was then it does an evaluate & parse on the query.
$L.a.char1=substr($L.external.query, 1, 1)
if ($L.a.char1="$") then ($L.external.query=evaluate(parse($L.external.query, 2)))
Made changes for I2566
I make $L.sql=NULL if the action is "search" on the display.decide panel.
Devtx I1464
Updated se.search.engine app on check.env panel to use exit to init.vars if:
nullsub($L.authorized, false) or $L.admin.mode=true and index("SysAdmin", $lo.ucapex)>0

updated the get.link panel to pass in $L.object.type to the 'se.get.link.application'
Modified the set.mult.yes and set.mult.no panels to remove the $L.sort={} expression.
Honor stored QBE formats passed in

Added the following line:
if (not null(file.name in $L.object)) then ($L.no.auth.msg=scmsg(185, "object", {file.name in $L.object}))
Added the $L.exit.when.done variable to the process call and post check.
Changed for Cut through.
Changed the condition for the mark.external.query exit on the check.query panel:
From:
not null($L.external.query)
To:
not null($L.external.query) or $L.from.query=true
Updated for cut through changes. Now will pass an external query to the search processes if a non standard search "Process" is defined.
Panel fill
Changed the normal exit from display to check.fc.display.
Fixed parameter issue for previous change.
Updated to pop the "No records found" message.
Added processing to "clear" and "restore" panels to support the restore of global variable information on the search screen for probsummary.
Changed the way the object name (for display) is generated.
Added friendlier error message when the table cannot be displayed.
Do not default format to object name, that happens correctly in se.get.object now.
Add processing now goes through se.base.method.
Modified application to exit if engine.access in $L.object is false - the file is not accessible through the engine.
Modified cleanup to clean up $smart.search.
master format control was not being called when adding a new record from a database search screen.
Added 3 panels and changed the flow to:
display.decide.1 --> get.master.fc --> check.master.fc --> check.mater.fc.add --> add.fc
Removed extraneous panels.
added a line to the set.screen.id panel .
Inserted the following into the 4th line:
if ($L.object.type="device") then ($L.format=$L.default.format)
now the format will remain the same when using the 'Search Specific Type' option in Inventory Management even after doing a search and then hitting the back button.
Now passes back the qbe format parameter from expert search.
Added a parameter for QBE format. Specifically for use by query.stored.
Added the se.get.link routine to allow for master (File) links.
Added $L.format to the list of variables available to the init process.
Modification for special object type "device"
Change was made on the thread.list.engine panel:
changed the normal exit from 'reset.contents' to 'check.exit.list'
fixed a parenthesis in check.list.engine.
When coming from an external query that has no records but the external option is set to "stay", the $L.from.query variable is reset when the search screen is displayed.
Modified so that $L.sort is always an array.
Will now run the display format control.
Modified post.add panel to go directly to select.records rather than search.
Added internationalization messages.
on panel no.records i removeed the code the null'd the sql line
Added in threading for Search -> List.
Cursor position is now kept when doing a validity lookup.
Added initial format control call.
Perform a get.base.form.name on the format name to ensure we get the right formatcontrol and link records.
Added $L.messages to the parameters passed to processes.
Added option for finding revisions.
Added exits of "runquery" and "display"
If using an $L.exit of "new" from a process, you will now go to the view engine with a mode of "add"

Changed post.add exit from select.records to search to pass the new record (instead of a null query) into se.list.engine. Nulled out sysmodtime, sysmoduser and sysmodcount fields on a failed add before returning to the display screen.
Added $L.mode="search"
Added no auth message.
Added in default sort (from format control or environment).
When you add a record, it will show up in a record list immediately instead of showing a blank record list.
Due to database using the search engine, the change is now made here instead of the database application. Changed the normal exit for the panel find from display to call a new panel call.db.init
Added the functionality to run a script specified in the formatcontrol upon entry.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
